altTitles.es-la: Registros de la Secta de la Espada Blanca

description.en:
Frozen human? A martial arts supreme leader the world never knew! The slumbering Strange Master awakens!

After falling unconscious due to an unexpected accident, he wakes up to find that thirty years have passed. During that time, his sect, the White Sword Sect, has fallen into decline and was destroyed by the martial world’s forces. He learns the tragic news that Jin yeongrim, his senior and the sect leader, has met a grim end.

The man whose mere presence made the martial arts world tremble—Sword Master Yu Jangryeong.
His legacy has been entirely inherited by a man the world has never known—Ja Un-hyun.

In this unfamiliar world, where his loved ones are now part of the past, Ja Un-hyun transcends conventions and life-and-death struggles. With his unpredictable eccentricity and unparalleled martial arts skills, he embarks on a thrilling, action-packed journey filled with laughter and boldness.

altTitles.en: There Are No Red Flowers for Ten Days

altTitles.es-la: Venganza de la Flor de Ciruelo

description.en:
The scripture that brought a bloodstorm to Jianghu was the "Wisdom of the Secret Master," a legendary book that is said to hold the power to seize all the world's authority and wealth. Because of it, Woonseon lost all his loved ones overnight. 
Now, he casts aside his bright and pure past and embarks on a desperate journey for revenge. The flower will wither in ten days. Nothing in this world will be eternal, whether it's wealth, power, or love.

altTitles.ja: 女ともだちと結婚してみた。

altTitles.zh: 尝试与女性朋友结婚了

altTitles.zh-hk: 嘗試與女性朋友結婚了

altTitles.th: คุณเพื่อนคะลองมาแต่งงานกันมั้ย

description.en:
Two women who are just friends make a pact… "If both of us are still single in 5 years, let's get married." Five years later, they meet again, and their married life begins.  
  
[Serialised in Yuri Hime starting in November 2020.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-10-17/donuts-under-a-crescent-moon-shio-usui-launches-new-manga-in-november/.165322)
description.ja: 「5年後お互い独り身だったら結婚しよう」そんな友達との約束が実を結び、結婚することになったくるみと瑠璃子。恋人だったわけじゃない”ともだち”同士の二人の結婚生活は、何から何まで初めてづくし。
description.pt-br:
Duas mulheres que são apenas 
amigas fazem uma promessa... 
"Se nós duas ainda estivermos 
solteiras em 5 anos, vamos nos 
casar." Cinco anos depois, elas se 
reencontram, e as suas vidas 
de casadas começa.

altTitles.ja-ro: Tadayoedo Shizumazu, Saredo Naki mo Sezu

altTitles.ja: 囀る鳥は羽ばたかない

description.en: Yashiro is the young leader of Shinseikai and the president of the Shinseikai Enterprise, but like so many powerful men, he leads a double life as a deviant and a masochist. Chikara Doumeki comes to work as a bodyguard for him and, although Yashiro had decided that he would never lay a hand on his own men, he finds there's something about Doumeki that he can't resist. Yashiro makes advances toward Doumeki, but Doumeki has mysterious reasons for denying. Yashiro, who abuses his power just to abuse himself, and Doumeki, who faithfully obeys his every command, begin the tumultuous affair of two men with songs in their hearts and no wings to fly.

altTitles.ja: 大室家

description.en:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
description.ja: 優秀な長女・撫子、残念な次女・櫻子、優秀な三女・花子からなる大室家３姉妹。自由奔放な櫻子を中心に今日も大室さん家は賑やかです♪

altTitles.th: บันไดเสียงเพี้ยนรัก

altTitles.ja: オクターヴ

description.en:
“Ever since I was a little girl, I’ve been infatuated with the “other side”; the world of splendor. Yes, I wanted to become one of those glittering stars. And so, my dream has come true. But now…All I want is to be beloved by someone.”  
  
When she was young, Yukino Miyashita wanted, more than anything else to become an idol. After accomplishing her dream, however, the idol group she was part of failed to sell, and she returned to school, facing alienation from her peers. Now, at age 18, Yukino is living alone in Tokyo, half-heartedly trying to start a new life as a talent manager, while not quite able to put her idol days behind her. She meets Setsuko, a songwriter who also once belonged to a failed idol group. The romance sparked by her encounter with Setsuko causes Yukino to reevaluate her own life.
description.pt-br:
"Desde que eu era pequena, eu estive apaixonada pelo outro lado", o mundo do esplendor. Sim, eu queria ser uma daquelas estrelas cintilantes. E assim, meu sonho se tornou realidade. Mas agora... Tudo o que eu quero é ser amada por alguém...
  
Quando era jovem, Yukino Miyashita queria, mais do que qualquer outra coisa, se tornar uma ídolo. No entanto, depois de realizar o seu sonho, o grupo de ídolos de que fazia parte não conseguiu vender e ela retornou à escola, enfrentando a alienação dos seus colegas. Agora, aos 18 anos, Yukino vive sozinha em Tóquio, tentando, sem entusiasmo, começar uma nova vida como gerente de talentos, mas sem conseguir esquecer os seus dias de ídolo. Conhece Setsuko, uma compositora que também pertenceu a um grupo de ídolos fracassado. O romance que surge do seu encontro com Setsuko faz com que Yukino reavalie a sua própria vida

title.en: Boku no Kowareta Seigi wa Loop Suru Isekai de Ai to Tsumi wo Tenbin ni Kakeru

altTitles.ja: ぼくの壊れた正義はループする異世界で愛と罪を天秤にかける

altTitles.en: My Broken Justice Weighs Love and Sin on the Scales in a Looping Parallel World

description.en:
The school is suddenly transported to another world, where it is overrun by monsters and turned into hell.

Okoyo Takumi, who lost his life while trying to escape with his beloved sister, Haruna, realizes that every time he dies he returns to the same time. Takumi is at the mercy of the monsters’ deadly siege and imprisoned in a prison of time that sends him back to the same time every time he dies. He continues to struggle, overcoming the rape and death of his loved ones time and time again. After successfully hunting an orc, a fanfare resonates in Takumi's mind.
description.ja: 突如異世界に転移した学園は、モンスターたちに蹂躙され地獄と化した。最愛の義姉、春名と逃げようとして命を落とした御好巧は自身が死ぬ度に同じ時間に戻っていることに気づく。モンスターたちの死の包囲に翻弄され、死ぬ度に同じ時間に巻き戻される時の牢獄に囚われた巧は、愛する者の凌辱と死を何度も乗り越えて足掻き続け――オークを狩ることに成功した巧の脳裏にファンファーレが響きわたる。

description.en: In a city overflowing with heinous crimes and violence, two girls make it their job to kill criminals who can not be dealt with by police.

"There's no such thing as happily ever after. Because the two of us aren't a prince and a princess…"  


---
description.it: Trama: Lilithia e Lu Die sono amiche sin dall'infanzia, ma appartengono a due clan da sempre in lotta tra loro. Per unire le due famiglie e porre fine agli scontri i capi dei due clan decidono di dare Lilithia in sposa al fratello di Lu Die. Il giorno delle nozze, però, accade qualcosa di inaspettato…

altTitles.ja: 恋する暴君

description.en: University student Tetsuhiro Morinaga has been in love with his homophobic, violent and tyrannical senpai Souichi Tatsumi for more than four years now. Even though in the previous series, Challengers, he told Souichi how he feels and even managed to get a kiss, he never expected anything more… That is until the long-oppressed Morinaga gets his biggest chance ever. Will his unrequited love finally be returned?

altTitles.ja: イケメン女と箱入り娘

description.en: Ooguma Satomi has never been in a relationship. One day, she fell in love with a handsome younger boy in her class, without knowing that he… is actually a girl.

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

altTitles.fr: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.fr: Un jeune prêtre, entraîné par le Vatican pour devenir l'exorciste le plus puissant du monde, reçoit pour mission divine de protéger une jeune artiste, Imuri Atsuki. Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

title.en: The Exiled Duke Wanted to Take it Easy On the Frontier and Work the Fields.

altTitles.ja: 追放された転生公爵は、辺境でのんびりと畑を耕したかった

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihou Sareta Tensei Koushaku wa, Henkyou de Nonbiri to Hatake o Tagaya Shita Katta

altTitles.ja: 追放された転生公爵は、辺境でのんびりと畑を耕したかった ～来るなというのに領民が沢山来るから内政無双をすることに～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihousareta Tensei Koushaku wa, Henkyou de Nonbiri to Hatake wo Tagayashitakatta: Kuru na to Iu no ni Ryoumin ga Takusan Kuru kara Naisei Musou wo Suru Koto ni

description.en: Reincarnated from Earth into a world of magic and tradition, Joshua, the son of a duke, is exiled to a barren frontier after the saintess declares he is not following the oracle’s prophecy. Hoping to live a quiet and uneventful life, his plans are upended when the people from his former dukedom abandon their lands to follow him, insisting he remains their true lord. Reluctantly, Joshua takes on the task of transforming the wasteland into a thriving home for his followers, vowing to complete the work in three years so he can finally enjoy the peaceful life he longs for.

The Earth's existence is under threat once more as Itarim, the gods of other universes, seek to fill the void left by the Absolute Being. 

Sung Jinwoo has no choice but to send Beru, the shadow ant king, to awaken his son's powers and start him on the journey he once took. 

Suho must conquer the shadow dungeon and earn his place in the world of hunters as he navigates through a new world against a new evil looking to swallow the world whole.
description.ko:
줄거리

평범한 대학생으로 살아가던 성수호 죽음을 앞둔 순간, 잠들어 있던 그의 특별한 혈통이 깨어난다!

“일어나라.”

죽음을 거스르고 지배하는 헌터, 그가 선보이는 새로운 레벨업을 주목하라!

* 이 작품은 웹툰 <나 혼자만 레벨업>의 세계관을 이어받은 작품입니다.
description.pt-br:
A existência da Terra está ameaçada novamente, por Itarim, os deuses de outros universos, buscam preencher o vazio deixado pelo Ser Absoluto.

Sung Jinwoo não tem outra opção senão enviar Beru, o rei das formigas das sombras, para despertar os poderes de seu filho e iniciar sua jornada, como ele fez antes.

Suho precisa conquistar a masmorra das sombras e ganhar seu lugar no mundo dos caçadores, enquanto enfrenta um novo mal que ameaça engolir o mundo inteiro.

altTitles.ja: ほんと野獣

description.en:
A policeman, a yakuza and an underwear thief – where better to start a love story?  
  
Ueda Tomoharu is a cop manning a local koban station, and he's quite happy with his job. He lives a relatively quiet life – until he happens to run into yakuza member Gotouda Aki, while chasing down an underwear thief… and is suddenly confessed to! Aki doesn’t seem bothered in the least about their star-crossed lovers status and he eagerly dives into a super lovey-dovey relationship with this policeman, but Ueda's about to find out just how dangerous it can be dating a mobster… in more ways than one.
description.pl: Związki bywają pokręcone. To nic niezwykłego. A co jeśliby sparować policjanta i członka yakuzy? W dodatku, kiedy jeden prezentuje wyjątkowo stoicką postawę, a drugi jest uroczym, acz nadpobudliwym i opacznie wszystko interpretującym paniczem? Poznamy również ich bliskich - którzy będą w stanie w przeciągu jednego rozdziału zaburzyć tok fabuły - oraz postaci, które będą się przewijać w czasie jej trwania, czasem zostając na dłużej, a niekiedy przyćmiewając głównych bohaterów!

altTitles.ja: 全力偏愛ガール

description.en: A super rich Ojou-sama, Aiu Eiko is passionately in love with her classmate, Nagi Nagisa. The daily life of a little(?) weird high school girl.
description.pt: Uma super-rica Ojou-sama, Aiu Eiko é apaixonada por sua colega Nagi Nagisa. A vida cotidiana de uma garotinha estranha do colegial.

altTitles.ja: ファインダーの標的
ファインダーの檻
ファインダーの熱情
ファインダーの真実
ファインダーの虜囚
ファインダーの隻翼

description.en: Freelance photographer Akihito Takaba is captured by the very subject he's been stalking in his viewfinder – the handsome and enigmatic crime lord Ryuichi Asami! The older man ravages him, both body and mind. Does this mean the end for the naive photographer, or will he live to shoot another day?

altTitles.ja: シトラスプラス

description.en: High schoolers (and stepsisters) Yuzu and Mei have gone public with their relationship! The two are happy to be dating out in the open, but friends and family keep trying to butt in with advice. Can Yuzu and Mei figure things out on their own?
description.it: Seguito di Citrus ambientato dopo la fine del manga! Yuzu è riuscita a convincere Mei a tornare da lei e le ha chiesto di sposarla! In Citrus+ seguiremo le vicende delle due ragazze una volta riunite e delle loro amiche che non le lasciano mai sole.
description.pt-br: As estudantes do ensino médio (e meias-irmãs) Yuzu e Mei foram a público com seu relacionamento! As duas estão felizes em namorar ao ar livre, mas amigos e familiares continuam tentando se aproximar com conselhos. Yuzu e Mei podem resolver as coisas sozinhas?

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

description.en:
She grew up an orphan, working herself to death in part-time jobs, and eventually died from exhaustion. 

Right before her death, she was reading an R-rated romance fantasy novel and found herself reincarnated as Annette Ethelred, the twisted villainess who was adopted into a duke's family and was bent on killing the novel's heroine. Annette was also the last princess of a fallen kingdom. Her happiness over the lavish lifestyle of the duke’s family didn’t last long, as she was quickly thrown out with nothing to her name, punished for the evil deeds of the original Annette. 

But giving up wasn’t an option. With the survival skills honed from all her part-time jobs, she managed to get hired as a maid at the temple. 

"This time around, I’ll make lots of money and date a handsome man! ...But seriously, are there no normal guys around here?!"

title.en: Shimotsuki-san wa Mobu ga Suki ~Hitomishiri na Kanojo wa Ore ni Dake Dere Amai~

altTitles.ja: 霜月さんはモブが好き～人見知りな彼女は俺にだけデレ甘い～

altTitles.en: Shimotsuki-san Likes the Mob: This Shy Girl is Only Sweet Towards Me

altTitles.vi: Shimotsuki-san chỉ thích nhân vật nền

altTitles.th: นิยาย ตัว (ไม่) ประกอบของคุณชิโมสึกิ เล่ม

altTitles.zh: 霜月同学喜欢上路人角色

altTitles.id: Shimotsuki-san Menyukai Mob ~Gadis Pemalu Ini Hanya Terlihat Manis di Hadapanku~

altTitles.en: She Is In Love with the Mob

altTitles.pl: Shimotsuki-san Lubi Postać Poboczną: Ta Nieśmiała Dziewczyna jest Urocza Tylko Wobec Mnie

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng Shimotsuki trót phải lòng nhân vật nền

description.en:
***Only you are special.***

After school, Koutarou Nakayama returns to school to pick up something he forgot and finds Shiho Shimotsuki asleep in an empty classroom. Shiho is rumored to be Ryouma Ryuuzaki's crush, a popular boy who has formed a harem in his class, but she is always expressionless and no one has ever seen her smile.

But now, her fair skin is holding Koutarou's hand...?! The "secret relationship" between the heroine and the mob begins!
description.id: Sepulang sekolah, Nakayama Koutarou kembali ke sekolah untuk mengambil sesuatu yang lupa dia bawa, di dalam kelas dia bertemu Shimotsuki Shiho yang terlelap. Katanya, Shiho ini ditaksir sama Ryuuzaki Ryouma, pria populer membentuk harem di kelas, namun dia tampak selalu datar dan tak ada yang pernah melihatnya tersenyum. Karena suatu kejadian mereka berdua berpegangan tangan dan memulai “hubungan rahasia” antara heroin dan mob.
description.ja:
『例えばもし、この世界が＜物語＞だとするならば主人公は一体誰になるのだろう――。』

高校入学式当日、義妹・親友・幼馴染の3人の少女に『サヨナラ』を告げられた中山幸太郎は、一人孤独な高校生活をスタートさせる。自分は誰の人生においても取るに足らない存在、『モブ』であることを明確に認識した幸太郎だったが、ある日の放課後、幸太郎は誰もいない教室で眠りこける霜月しほに遭遇する。クラスでハーレムを形成中のモテ男・竜崎龍馬の大本命だが、いつも無表情でクールと噂の彼女。その彼女が幸太郎の手を握り、満面の笑顔でこう言った。「わたしとお友達になってくれる？」

『この物語の主人公は俺ではない。そう思っていた。あの日までは――。』
description.pl:
Tylko ty jesteś wyjątkowy.

Po lekcjach Koutarou Nakayama wraca do szkoły, by zabrać coś, czego zapomniał i znajduje Shiho Shimotsuki śpiącą w pustej klasie. Mówi się, że Shiho podkochuje się w Ryoumie Ryuuzakim, popularnym chłopaku, który założył harem w swojej klasie, ale ona zawsze jest bez wyrazu i nikt nigdy nie widział jej uśmiechu.

Ale teraz, trzyma rękę Koutarou...?! Rozpoczyna się „sekretny związek” między bohaterką a postacią poboczną!
description.pt-br: Depois da escola, Kotaro Nakayama retorna à escola para pegar algo que esqueceu e encontra Shiho Shimotsuki dormindo em uma sala de aula vazia. Há rumores de que Shiho é a paixão de Ryoma Ryuuzaki, um garoto popular que formou um harém em sua classe, mas ela é sempre inexpressiva e ninguém nunca a viu sorrindo. Mas agora, ela está segurando a mão de Kotaro…?! A “relação secreta” entre a heroína e o figurante começa!

title.en: Watashi no Hara no Naka no Bakemono

altTitles.ja: 私の胎の中の化け物

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi no Tai no Naka no Bakemono

altTitles.vi: Con quái vật trong tử cung của tôi

description.en:
***Awaken the "malice" sleeping inside you.***

Chinatsu is a middle school girl who's an honor student and highly trusted by her teacher. She gets along with her friends, and she spends her days happily without hating anyone. 

However, on her period, Chinatsu realized it. That she hated her homeroom advisor, and she's extremely irritated by her surroundings. She had put a lid on her own feelings and pretended not to notice, but when she became aware of it, the "monster" inside of her begins to rampage and reveal her true nature.

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 貴方の中の“悪意”を目覚めさす。衝撃のサスペンス!!優等生で、先生からの信頼も厚い女子中学生の神城千夏。友達とも仲良く、誰のことも嫌いになんてならない幸せな日々を過ごしていた…はずだった。しかし、千夏は気づいてしまった。担任の塚本のことが嫌いだと、周りに対してとてもいらいらしていることを。フタをして、見ないふりをしていた自分の気持ちを自覚した時、千夏の中にいた“化け物”が暴れ出し、本性を現し始めた。
description.vi:
Sẽ ra sao nếu một ngày những biến cố, bất công của cuộc đời liên tiếp ập đến, để rồi đánh thức con ác ma đang trú ngụ trong trái tim bạn?
Kamishiro Chinatsu, nữ sinh cấp hai, là một học sinh giỏi, đồng thời còn là lớp trưởng được giáo viên hết mực tín nhiệm. Một cô bé hòa đồng với bạn bè và trải qua những ngày vui vẻ mà không ghét lấy một ai.
Tuy nhiên, Chinatsu nhận thấy cảm xúc căm ghét của cô bé dành cho Tsukada, giáo viên chủ nhiệm của mình đang một lớn dần, đến mức khiến cô bé chán ghét tất cả mọi thứ xung quanh. Nhận ra chuyện này, cô bé đã tìm cách che đậy và quay lưng lại với nó. Nhưng rồi "con quái vật" vốn trú ngụ bên trong Chinatsu bắt đầu hành động và bộc lộ bản chất thật của mình, thứ mà cô bé đã luôn muốn trốn tránh.

altTitles.ja: 私が死んだら泣きますか

altTitles.en: Will You Cry for Me If I Die?

altTitles.ur: Agar mein mari, tum rogi kya?
اگر میں مری، تم روگی کیا؟

altTitles.ja: 賢者の孫

altTitles.th: หลานจอมปราชญ์

altTitles.vi: Cháu trai của nhà thông thái

description.en:
Thanks to various magic, the human race has been saved from calamity many, many times. Retaining his memories from his previous life, a boy, Shin, was picked up by an old man known to the world as the "Magi." Shin was brought up by the Magi, who had retired to a secular place, as his own grandson. With the memories of his past life, he absorbed the Magi's craft and grew to be able to develop his own magic. Then, the grandfather told him he has to become independent when he reaches the age of 15.

"Ah, I forgot to teach him common sense."

The grandson who has grown beyond the level of normal people, lacked common sense; the common sense of the world. So to learn how to socialize, he goes to Earlshide Kingdom City to be admitted to Earlshide Advanced Magic Academy.
description.ja: 事故で死んだはずの青年が、赤ん坊の姿で異世界に転生。そして救国の英雄「賢者」マーリン・ウォルフォードに拾われた彼は、シンと名付けられる。孫として育てられたシンはマーリンから魔法を教わるが、その習得速度は驚くべきもので、メキメキと力をつけていく。一方、山奥で世間から隔離されて育った弊害として、シンには一つ致命的な問題があった…。そう、シンが１５歳となった時に祖父・マーリンは言ったのだ――「常識を教えるの忘れとった」！　かくして常識と友達を得るためアールスハイド高等魔法学院に入学するシンだったが――。

altTitles.ja: カケル

description.en: When high school student Kakeru Daiba runs for long enough, he enters into a runner's high state that heightens his senses. When his crush, Natsume, disappears mysteriously one day he's forced to use his ability in ways he never expected.
description.ja: 「走り過ぎるとオレの”目”はもう一つの世界を映し出す！」　高校生、台場駆は生まれつき、視覚、触覚、味覚、嗅覚、聴覚が異常に鋭くなる能力を持っていた。ガールフレンドの夏目葵が突然消えた事件で、初めてその力を使うことになるのだが果たして？バカンスのつもりで訪れた島で、連続殺人事件に巻き込まれてしまうものの…

description.en:
Humanity was designated as a disruptive species of the Cosmic Ecosystem. To reduce humanity's numbers, the universe's administrators initiate a survival game.

Jin Jaehee, having returned from the final stage of the game, reaches one clear conclusion.

"Kang Shion - only he can lead us to victory in this game."

Kang Shion, a genius with an unparalleled mind. Jin Jaehee, a regressor who lost in the survival game and returned to the past.

With the regressor as his ally, Kang Shion begins to unravel the death game with unprecedented skill.
description.ko:
우주생태교란종으로 선정된 인류. 우주의 관리자에 의해 인간의 개체수를 줄이기 위한 생존 게임이 시작된다.

그 최종 단계에서 회귀한 진재희는 한가지 결론을 내린다.

“강시온, 오직 그만이 이 게임을 승리로 이끌 수 있어.”

천재적인 두뇌의 소유자, 강시온. 생존 게임에서 패배해 과거로 돌아온 회귀자, 진재희.

회귀자를 조력자로 얻게 된 강시온은 역대급 능력으로 데스 게임을 풀어나간다.

title.en: Hazure Potion ga Shouyu datta no de Ryouri suru koto ni shimashita

altTitles.ja: ハズレポーションが醤油だったので料理することにしました

altTitles.en: I Decided to Cook Because the Potion was Soy Sauce

altTitles.zh: 将劣质药水当作酱油开始烹饪吧

altTitles.ru: Неудачное зелье оказалось соевым соусом, поэтому я и решила готовить.

description.en: Yuuri, a 30-year-old housewife who was unilaterally abandoned in marriage, suddenly gets lost in a different world. She, who was introduced to the work of potion harvesting by an S-class adventurer and gradually got used to life in a different world, realized the ridiculous secret of the harvested potion. The potion without the recovery function that she thought was off was actually soy sauce. In addition, dishes made with it have a bonus of correction function! Will Yuuri's dishes change the common sense of the other world?
description.ja: 一方的に婚姻破棄を突き付けられた三十路主婦ユーリは、突如、異世界に迷い込む。冒険者ギルドにいたS級冒険者にポーション収穫の仕事を紹介され、異世界の生活にも徐々に慣れていくユーリは、収穫したポーションのとんでもない秘密に気付いた。外れだと思っていた回復機能のないポーションが、実は醤油だったのだ。しかも、ハズレポーションで作った料理は補正機能のオマケ付き!　 ユーリの料理は異世界の常識を変えてしまうのか?
description.ru:
Брошенная мужем, 30 летняя домохозяйка впервые пошла устраиваться на работу. Но попала в другой мир...
Да, вот так просто, без грузовичка-сана.
Что же будет делать в другом мире никогда не работающая до этого домохозяйка? И при чём здесь соевый соус?
Медитативная история о человеческих отношениях, зельях и приготовлении еды в фэнтези мире.

altTitles.ja: 伝説の男の娘もっこり配信者

description.en:
A femboy shows off his bulge on a livestream!!

However, it gets even more popular than he expected?!

---

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mukunozaltusou/status/1844651030761685297)
description.id: Seorang cowok cantik mencoba mengolok-olok penonton om-om dengan Steaming sambil cross-dressing dan memamerkan tubuh montoknya!! Namun, tidak disangka dia mendapatkan popularitas karena hal lain...!?
description.ja:
配信でもっこりを見せつける男の娘‼

しかし、それが以外にも人気が出てしまい…⁉

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ

description.en:
The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies.

---
  - Alternative English Translation: [<comikey>](https://comikey.com/comics/record-of-ragnarok-manga/61/)
description.fa: ⁧⁧ داستان جایی شروع میشه که خدایان بحث این رو به میان میاورند که انسان‌ها زنده بمانند یا نابود شوند. ولی یک والکری به تنهایی بحث را به سمتی میکشاند که به انسان‌ها اجازه یک مبارزه در مقابل خدایان داده شود. و به این شکل کور سوی امید بشریت روشن باقی میماند. سیزده خدا، سیزده انسان، در مقابل هم قرار میگیرند تا سرنوشت بشریت را مشخص کنند
description.fr: Tous les mille ans, l'ensemble des dieux, tous panthéons réunis, se réunissent au Valhalla, le paradis des âmes, lors d'une assemblée présidée par Zeus, le dieu suprême grec, afin de décider du sort des humains. Or, cette année-là, il est décidé à la quasi-unanimité de détruire l'humanité. Mais la Valkyrie Brunehilde interrompt la conférence et propose aux dieux de se mesurer aux mortels lors du tournoi de Ragnarök, pour déterminer s'ils valent vraiment la peine d'êtres anéantis. Ce tournoi opposera 13 dieux issus de diverses mythologies à 13 puissants humains qui ont fait l'histoire. Si l'humanité remporte au moins sept des 13 duels, alors les dieux épargneront l'humanité.
description.id: - In Indonesian by [Akasha](http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/akasha-record-of-ragnarok-01) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.it: - In Italian by [Star Comics](https://www.starcomics.com/titoli-fumetti/record-of-ragnarok) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.ru: История начинается c собрания богов, на котором они решают судьбу человечества: убить всех или оставить в живых, согласившись в никчёмности рода людского, боги выбирают первое... Но одна валькирия выдвигает предложение: позволить богам и человечеству сразиться в битве, в качестве последнего луча надежды людей. 13 богов сразятся против 13 чемпионов людей в битвах один на один, чтобы решить, будет ли человечество жить или сгинет в могуществе божественной силы.
description.tr: Hikâye, tanrıların insanlığın yaşamasına ya da ölmesine karar vermek için bir toplantı düzenlemesi ve insanlığı yok etmeye karar vermesiyle başlar. Ancak yalnız bir Valkyrie, insanlığın hayatta kalması için son bir umut olarak tanrıların ve insanlığın son bir savaşa girmesine izin verilmesi önerisini ortaya atar. 13 tanrı, insanlığın yaşayıp yaşamayacağına karar vermek için teke tek savaşlarda 13 insan şampiyona karşı dövüşecektir.
description.uk: Історія починається зі зборів богів, на яких вирішується доля людства: життя чи смерть. Погодившись з нікчемністю людського роду, боги вибирають друге... Але одна валькірія висуває пропозицію: дозволити богам і людям битися в битві, яка стане останнім променем надії для людства. 13 богів б'ються проти 13 людських чемпіонів у битвах віч-на-віч, щоб вирішити, чи буде людство жити чи згине у могутності божественної сили.
description.es-la: Los Dioses se reúnen con el objetivo de decidir si la humanidad debe vivir o morir. Y aunque llegan a la conclusión de que debe perecer, una Valkyria propone que una lucha de dioses contra humanos para tomar tan difícil decisión. Así, 13 humanos pelearán contra 13 Dioses para resolver el destino de la humanidad.
description.pt-br: A cada 1.000 anos, as divindades se reúnem sob o conselho de Valhalla para decidir sobre o direito da humanidade de continuar vivendo, ou por sua destruição, porém desta vez os deuses estão furiosos com o descaso humano para com o planeta, pendendo passim para aniquilar toda a raça humana, porém uma única valquíria os convencem de realizar o Ragnarok, uma batalha mortal entre humanos e deuses para decidir sob sua sobrevivência, 13 humanos enfrentarão 13 deuses. Serão este humanos capazes de colidir com as poderosas divindades?

title.en: The Story of Our Corpse Hunt

altTitles.ja: ぼくたちの死体さがし

description.en:
A boy x a summer x an adventure = "Boy Meets Crime"!

Shocking juvenile suspense!

One day during the summer vacation, a young boy called Isshin, Kazuma Inui, leaves with his friends who attend the same junior high school to meet again with "that girl" who disappeared several years ago.
And all the truths lead to child kidnapping cases that are rampant in the land. Depicting the darkness of society!

altTitles.ja: 拷問迷宮

description.en: He awoke in a cold and rustic room. There were only a door and torture devices inside of it. While he could not yet grasp the situation, a number rose to the surface on the back of his right hand. "I know your pain." The young man figured out that pain and the door were linked, and so he could only endure his own suffering.

altTitles.ja: あかね噺

description.en: Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical entertainment. Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane will take her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br: Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo na história é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

altTitles.ja: ユメかウツツか

description.en: The main character, Iroha, is a first-year high school student who finds it difficult to talk to others. Even though it’s been about two months since she started high school, she still hasn’t had a proper conversation with any of her classmates. During every break, she quietly slips out of the classroom and heads to the courtyard by the old school building. She does this to meet and talk with a senior she met at the town library while studying for exams. This senior, who is a year older, has become a source of support for Iroha. However, the two of them share a secret...
description.es: La protagonista, Iroha, es una estudiante de primer año de instituto a la que le cuesta hablar con los demás. Aunque han pasado dos meses desde que empezó el instituto, todavía no ha tenido una conversación adecuada con ninguno de sus compañeros. En los recreos, se escapa de clase y se dirige al patio, junto al antiguo edificio de la escuela. Lo hace para encontrarse y hablar con un estudiante de último curso que conoció en la biblioteca del pueblo mientras estudiaba para los exámenes. Este alumno, un año mayor que ella, se ha convertido en una fuente de apoyo para Iroha. Sin embargo, ambos comparten un secreto...
description.fr: Iroha, le personnage principal, est un lycéen de première année qui a du mal à parler aux autres. Bien que deux mois se soient écoulés depuis son entrée au lycée, elle n'a encore jamais eu de véritable conversation avec l'un de ses collègues de classe. Durant la récréation, il sort de la classe en cachette et se rend dans la cour de récréation située à côté de l'ancien bâtiment scolaire. Elle le fait pour rencontrer un élève de terminale qu'elle a rencontré à la bibliothèque municipale alors qu'elle étudiait pour ses examens. Cet étudiant, qui a un an de plus qu'elle, est devenu une source de soutien pour Iroha. Cependant, toutes deux partagent un secret...
description.ja: 主人公は他人と会話することが苦手な高校1年生・いろは。高校入学から約2カ月、いまだクラスの人とまともに話せない彼女は、休み時間のたびに教室を抜け出しては旧校舎側の中庭に向かう。その目的とは、受験勉強をしているときに町の図書館で出会った1つ年上の先輩と話すこと。先輩との交流を支えに日々を過ごすいろはだが、2人にはある秘密があって……。
description.es-la: La protagonista, Iroha, es una estudiante de primer año de instituto a la que le cuesta hablar con los demás. Aunque han pasado dos meses desde que empezó el instituto, todavía no ha tenido una conversación adecuada con ninguno de sus compañeros. En los recreos, se escapa de clase y se dirige al patio, junto al antiguo edificio de la escuela. Lo hace para encontrarse y hablar con un estudiante de último curso que conoció en la biblioteca del pueblo mientras estudiaba para los exámenes. Este alumno, un año mayor que ella, se ha convertido en una fuente de apoyo para Iroha. Sin embargo, ambos comparten un secreto...

altTitles.ja: イナズマイレブン爆外伝集

description.en:
The first volume features different stories about the original cast's training sessions and special techniques. It fills in gaps that were never explained before and offers a new point of view about some in-game scenes.  
  
The second volume recreates the world seen in the videogame "Inazuma Eleven Strikers" for Wii, from the point of view of Inazuma Japan. It features many characters from every season and situations only seen in said game.

title.en: Fake Saint of the Year: You Wanted the Perfect Saint? Too Bad!

altTitles.ja-ro: Nise Seijo Kuso of the Year: Risou no Seijo? Zannen, Nise Seijo deshita!

altTitles.ru: Фальшивая святая, отброс года. ~Идеальная святая? Нет, всего лишь подделка!~

altTitles.ja: 偽聖女クソオブザイヤー～理想の聖女？　残念、偽聖女でした！～

description.en:
[The Eternal Scattering Flowers: Fiore Caduto Eterna] is a game ill-suited of being known as a galge, as the main heroine would – regardless of the chosen route – meet her demise.

Fudou Niito, a resident of Japan, went to bed dissatisfied with the ending of the game. When he next awoke, he found himself in the body of the game’s hated fake saint, Elrise. Confused, but with an understanding that Elrise’s actions would spell disaster for many lives in the future, he took advantage of the situation and acted to change the course of history.

As a result, despite her rotten personality, Elrise was adored by those around her as a perfect saint. Furthermore, the game itself was intrinsically linked to his original world and changed accordingly to suit Elrise’s actions. Without any knowledge of what the hell was going on, the fake saint Elrise continued to alter her fate.

A saint on the outside, but a man on the inside.

The transmigrator was a piece of shit and the person he transmigrated into was also a piece of shit. A combination of shit and shit would cause an accident – to create the greatest fake saint shitshow of the year!
description.id:
[The Eternal Scattering Flowers: Fiore Caduto Eterna] adalah sebuah permainan yang tidak cocok untuk di panggil sebagai galge, karena apapun rute yang di pilih heroine utama akan selalu menemui ajalnya.

Fudou Niito, seorang penduduk di jepang, pergi tidur dengan ketidakpuasan pada akhir dari gamenya. Selanjutnya ketika dia terbangun, ia menemukan dirinya berada dalam tubuh seorang saint yang di benci dalam game, Elrise.

Dia kebingungan, namun dengan pemahaman bahwa tindakan Elrise akan menyebabkan bencana untuk banyak kehidupan di masa depan, dia memanfaatkan situasi itu dan bertindak untuk mengubah jalannya sejarah.

Sebagai hasilnya, terlepas dari kepribadian busuknya, Elrise di cintai oleh orang-orang di sekitarnya sebagai seorang saint yang sempurna. Terlebih lagi, game itu sendiri pada intinya terhubung dengan dunia asli tempatnya berada dan berubah berdasarkan tindakan Elrise. Tanpa mengetahui apa yang sedang terjadi, seorang saint palsu Elrise terus-menerus mengubah takdirnya.

Seorang saint di luar, namun pria di dalamnya.

Orang yang merasuki adalah seorang bajingan dan orang yang di rasukinya juga merupakan seorang bajingan. Kombinasi dari para bajingan akan menyebabkan mala petaka yang akan menciptakan pertunjukan saint palsu bajingan terbesar tahun ini!
description.ja:
異世界で無双！　偽聖女で何が悪い…!?
ギャルゲー『永遠の散花』は、どのルートを選んでもメインヒロインが死ぬギャルゲーである。 ゲーム内に登場する悪役へ転生した俺は、ヒロインのエテルナを救うため、ゲーム知識をフル活用しようとするのだが…？
description.ru:
Визуальный роман «Куон но Санка ~Fiore caduto eterna~» — несправедливая игра, где в каждой из веток истории главная героиня умирает. Я, переродившийся в поддельную святую-злодейку игры Эльризе, решил по полной использовать все свои знания об игре, чтобы спасти главную героиню, Этерну, однако…

Внешность святой девы, а внутри мужик. Дерьмовой душе — дерьмовый персонаж. Как же развернётся история, где по случайности два отброса слились воедино?

title.en: Henkyou Mob Kizoku no Uchi ni Totsuidekita Akuyaku Reijou ga, Mechakucha Dekiru Yoi Yome Nanda ga?

altTitles.ja: 辺境モブ貴族のウチに嫁いできた悪役令嬢が、めちゃくちゃできる良い嫁なんだが？

altTitles.ja-ro: Henkyo Mob Kizoku no Uchi ni Totsuidekita Akuyaku Reijo ga, Mechakucha Dekiru Yoi Yome nanda ga?

altTitles.en: The Villainess Who Came to Marry Into the Frontier Noble's Household is an Exceptionally Capable Wife, Isn't She?
The Villainess Who Was Dumped Got Married into My Family, a Mob Noble from the Frontier, and Turns Out, She's an Amazing Capable Wife?

description.en:
Ragna, the heir to a frontier noble family, is a reincarnated former Japanese citizen who realizes that the world he now lives in is the setting of an otome game. Dreaming of a carefree life as an adventurer, his plans are derailed when a war takes his family, forcing him to take on the responsibilities of managing his family’s lands. 

Struggling with the unfamiliar duties of a lord, his already chaotic life takes another turn when an unexpected engagement to a noblewoman from a higher-ranking family is arranged.

To his surprise, the bride-to-be is Alicia, the "villainess" of the otome game’s story — a character destined for heartbreak, a demonic pact, and ultimate destruction. Now sharing his life with someone fated for tragedy, Ragna is swept up in the wheels of fate. 

Can he rewrite the predetermined outcomes of this world and secure a peaceful life for himself and Alicia?

title.en: Until the Soul of the Fallen Queen Knows Love

altTitles.ja: 滅んだ女王の魂が愛を知るまで

description.en:
Liaris has been mistreated as an 'incompetent person by everyone,including her family,all her life
But one day,she awakened her psychic powers,along with the memory of her previous life as a
queen.'If people were to find out about this power,they'll use me as they did in my previous life,
and I'll have an unhappy future again."Thinking this,Liaris decided to hide her ability and live
quietly as a helpless daughter.But when Edward,the sixth prince,learns of her secret,he asks her
to become his fiancee.Once more,Liaris is taken to the stage of the throne succession that will
shake the country.A romance fantasy about a strong daughter who wants to live quietly in a
peaceful world,and a lonely prince who wants to change the discriminatory world brought about
by his unusual powers.

In the MMORPG world, veteran player "Minseo" helps newbie healer "Angelica01" fend off trolls. Their friendship blossoms, leading Minseo to suggest a real-life meeting. However, he's surprised to find a tall, intimidating young man claiming to be Angelica's brother, "Jin." Strangely, Jin looks just like Angelica! Can Minseo navigate his feelings as he moves between the virtual and real worlds?

altTitles.ja: 廃后のスキャンダル

description.en:
Lucentia is a woman who was forced to marry the emperor, but was accused of treason and beheaded. She managed to escape death thanks to a precognitive dream and fled to the enemy empire, where she became Rose Von Isaac, a rich and powerful merchant. But Lucentia could not escape her fate, as she was the only one who could save the Duke of Aytan, a legendary swordsman who had a secret that could change everything. She proposed that he be her guardian, but he asked her to be his lover.

Lucentia decided that she would no longer be manipulated by fate and that she would live her life as she wanted.

Sophie, a boy with vampire and human blood, is transferred from an orphanage to an institution called Clan. The school houses vampire boys who have reached their Cocoon period, or puberty in human terms. Sophie has a fateful encounter with a boy named Ul while being coldly greeted by the vampires around him. As Ul continues to research the “power of immortality” that vampires once possessed, he learns of the existence of TRUMP, the original vampire that is said to live forever, and begins to crave eternal life.

Eventually, Sophie and Ul become entangled in the deep fate surrounding the legend of immortality...

A manga adaptation of the origin story of playwright Kenichi Suemitsu’s popular series! A Gothic school fantasy that beautifully spins the conflicts of impressionable and sensitive boysー!
description.ja: 吸血種<ヴァンプ>と人間の血が流れる少年ソフィは、養護院からクランと呼ばれる施設へと入所した。そこは繭期――人間でいうところの思春期を迎えた吸血種の少年たちが集う学園。周囲の吸血種から冷ややかな目で迎えられる中、ソフィはある一人の少年と運命的な出会いを果たす。劇作家・末満健一の人気シリーズの原点となる物語をコミック化!! 繊細かつ多感な少年たちの葛藤を美しく紡ぎ出すゴシック学園ファンタジー!
description.vi: Câu chuyện xoay quanh Sophie Anderson - một con lai giữa con người và ma cà rồng (Dhampir), bị khinh ghét vì sự không thuần khiết. Tuy vậy, Sophie vẫn vượt lên những trở ngại với trái tim cao quý và luôn đầy tự hào về dòng máu của mình.

title.en: Shiori Experience: My Plain Self and an Odd Old Man

altTitles.ja-ro: Shiori Experience - Jimi na Watashi to Hen na Ojisan

altTitles.ja: SHIORI EXPERIENCE ~ジミなわたしとヘンなおじさん~
シオリエクスペリエンス  ~ジミなわたしとヘンなおじさん~

altTitles.ru: Shiori Experience: незаурядный Джими и заурядная Я

altTitles.uk: Досвід Шіорі ~Джимі, я і дивний дядько~

description.en:
Shiori was once a guitarist in a light music club in high school. But her first live performance was dashed when her brother ran away from home with a lot of debt, to become a musician in Tokyo.  
  
A decade later, Shiori is now a high school teacher, leading a boring, uneventful life and paying off the debt… till she runs into the ghost of none other than a famous guitarist Jim-you-know-who.  
  
A story of a 27-year-old woman on her way to a music legend begins here.
description.ru: История о Шиори, скромной и неуклюжей 27-летней школьной учительнице, которая любит играть на гитаре и общается с призраком Джими Хендрикса.
description.pt-br: Shiori era uma guitarrista em um clube de música no colégio. Mas sua primeira apresentação ao vivo foi frustrada quando seu irmão fugiu de casa deixando um monte de dívidas para se tornar um músico em Tóquio. Uma década depois, Shiori é agora uma professora do ensino médio, levando uma vida monótona e entediante pagando as dívidas... Até ela dar de cara com o fantasma de ninguém menos que um famoso guitarrista chamado Jim-você-sabe-quem. A história de uma mulher de 27 anos de idade, a caminho de uma lenda musical começa aqui.

title.en: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni - Kataribanashi-hen Comic Anthology EX.

altTitles.ja: ひぐらしのなく頃に 語咄し編 コミックアンソロジーEX．

altTitles.ru: Когда Плачут Цикады: Глава о Сборнике Историй

description.en:
Kataribanashi-hen (語咄し編 Storytelling Chapter) is a compilation of winning fan stories for the Higurashi no Naku Koro ni series from the Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Contest (ひぐらしのなく頃に大賞).

Notably, the eight artists involved with the 10 main arcs of the manga all illustrated for at least one of the stories included in the novel volumes, while Karin Suzuragi and Jiro Suzuki even illustrated the cover arts for the manga volumes and Yutori Houjyou and Mimori each did the manga adaptation of a story. Among the other artists, Kei Natsumi, Soichiro, and Akai Higasa would later be involved with other works from 07th Expansion including Umineko no Naku Koro ni and Rose Guns Days. 

Some stories were adapted into a manga series named Kataribanashi-hen Comic Anthology EX (語咄し編 コミックアンソロジーEX Kataribanashi-hen Komikkuansorojī EX).

altTitles.ja: 機動戦史ガンダム武頼

description.en:
A new Gundam war picture scroll, where giant "Tetsuki" scatter the sparks of conflict, is born!

"Sankin Koutai" a large battle tournament where fierce fighters selected from all over the country board giant armored warriors known as Tetsuki to determine the strongest. In order to fulfill his wish, Kotetsu Kisaragi with his "Gundam" Burai, throws himself into the harsh battle...!
description.ja:
巨大な“鉄機”達が火華を散らす、新たなガンダム戦絵巻、爆誕!!

参勤鋼對――それは、全国各地から選ばれた猛者が、巨大な鎧武者・鉄機に乗り込み、最強を決める一大バトルトーナメント。『頑駄無』武頼を駆る如月虎鉄は、己が望みを果たすため過酷な戦へと身を投じるが…！？
description.pt-br: Uma nova história de guerra Gundam  nasce, onde os gigantescos 'Tetsuki' espalham as chamas do conflito. O 'Sankin Koutai', um grande torneio de batalha em que lutadores selecionados em todo o país, embarcam em guerreiros blindados gigantes conhecidos como Tetsuki, para determinar o mais forte. Kotetsu Kisaragi, com seu 'Gundam' Burai, se joga nesta batalha dura para cumprir seu desejo.

title.en: I Became a Top Actor Just by Reading Books!

altTitles.vi: Trở thành diễn viên hàng đầu nhờ vào việc đọc sách

description.en:
Due to his lack of talent, Seonghyeon gave up acting and became a writer. Seonghyeon is a genius author with a natural talent for screenplays, but he still misses acting. Then one day, he got into a truck accident on set.

“If I’m born again, I have to act,” he promised and closed his eyes.

Seonghyeon returns 13 years back into the past to when he was 24 years old. And the method acting ability that goes into his scripts became the character itself! Okay, this life is about being reborn as a genius actor!

title.en: Sagishi to Keisatsukan no Rennai Kyori

altTitles.ja: 詐欺師と警察官の恋愛距離

altTitles.en: The Love Gap Between a Con Man and a Policewoman

altTitles.vi: Khoảng cách tình yêu giữa chàng lừa đảo và nàng cảnh sát

altTitles.id: Jarak Cinta Antara Pria Penipu dan Polwan

description.en: Scammer Seiichi Sagino's mission this time is to stop Ren Karasuma, a police officer with a sharper sense of crime. At the beginning of their encounter, Sagino is told that he smells like a criminal. Will this action lead to unexpected developments...?

title.en: Tensei ni Hakobijin no Isekai Kouryakuhou

altTitles.ja: 転生荷運び人の異世界攻略法

altTitles.en: A Reincarnated Carrier's Strategy for Another World
The Way To Conquer A Different World As A Reincarnated Porter

altTitles.id: Strategi Menghadapi Dunia Lain oleh Seorang Carrier yang Bereinkarnasi

altTitles.vi: Người vận chuyển dị thế giới

description.en: A man who yearns for freedom is reincarnated and he chooses the undesirable job "Carrier"--The fastest way to conquer both women and other world with wisdom and courage!
description.ja: 戦闘力がほとんどなく最弱といわれるが、固有スキルとして収納スキルを持つジョブ「荷運び人」。セイは、転生にあたり多数の選択肢から、そんな「荷運び人」を選ぶ。その理由は、たくさんのアイテムを不自由なく持って、ひとりで気ままに世界を旅したいからというものだった。そんなセイが出会ったのは、純粋で無垢な僧侶・ルナミリア。危なっかしいルナミリアを放っておけず、セイは成り行きでパーティーを組むことになる。

altTitles.en: แบตเทอรี่ คู่หูเบสบอล

description.en:
Meet Harada Takumi—not even in junior high and he's the best pitcher in the region, although he's frustrated and ready to give up, because he can't find a catcher who is good enough to keep up with how he pitches in this backwater town his family has just moved to. Then along comes a kid named Nagakura Gou…  
  
(Source: MU)  
  
Links:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18153)

altTitles.vi: Tụi mình không có hẹn hò

description.en:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”
description.pt-br:
"Por que você continua perguntando se estamos namorando? Só estamos de mãos dadas, não estamos namorando!!"
É uma comédia romântica slice-of-life sobre casais que não são realmente casais!

altTitles.ja: はじめてのギャル

altTitles.en: My First Girlfriend is a Gal

altTitles.pt-br: Minha primeira namorada é uma Gal!

altTitles.vi: Cô Bạn Gái Của Tôi Là Một Gyaru

description.en: Spring. The 'season of love' has arrived and it seems that finding himself a girlfriend was harder than Jun'ichi believed. To break the status quo, Jun'ichi's friends have forced him into confessing to the gyaru, Yame Yukana. However, things do not go quite as he expected.
description.ja: DT(童貞)を捨てたいと悩む高校生・羽柴ジュンイチ。ある日、「ギャルに土下座で頼めば卒業できる」という迷信を聞いて、ダメ元でクラスのギャル・八女に土下座で告白した所…まさかの大成功!? 見事付き合うことになるのだが、ビッチなのに身持ちは固い八女さんに、非リアな羽柴は弄ばれる毎日で…。果たして羽柴は「はじめて」から卒業できるのか!?
description.vi: Mùa xuân, mùa của tình yêu đã đến và có vẻ như việc tìm ra bạn gái của anh ấy khó hơn với Junichi. Để tìm ra cách, bạn của Junichi buộc anh phải thú nhận với cô gái, Yame Yukana. Tuy nhiên, mọi việc không diễn ra như anh mong đợi. và cái gì tới nó tới
description.pt-br: Junichi Hashiba é um jovem colegial virgem que está desesperado para perder esse status. Sob pressão de seus amigos, o garoto acaba se declarando para Yukana Yame. Surpreendentemente a garota aceita  e um casal é formado. Porém, Jun acaba se encontrando em águas desconhecidas com Yame, que é uma gyaru (um tipo de moda urbana japonesa). Enquanto ele fantasia em perder a sua virgindade, ela se mostra mais normal e inocente do que ele imaginava.

altTitles.ja: ナルト
NARUTO―ナルト― カラー版

description.en: Twelve years ago, the powerful Nine-Tailed Demon Fox attacked the ninja village of Konohagakure. The demon was quickly defeated and sealed into the infant Naruto Uzumaki, by the Fourth Hokage who sacrificed his life to protect the village. Now Naruto is the number one knucklehead ninja who's determined to become the next Hokage and gain recognition by everyone who ever doubted him!
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do famoso mangá "Naruto". Uzumaki Naruto é um garoto que teve um demônio preso dentro dele quando era um bebê, para evitar que esse demônio destruísse sua vila. Ele cresceu sendo temido por todos, já que existe a lembrança dos mortos pelo demônio em quase todas as famílias. Evitado e ignorado, tudo o que ele realmente deseja é ser amado e reconhecido pelos outros, pelo que de fato ele é. Acompanhe a vida de Naruto, seu amor pela "doce e amável" Sakura e sua "amizade" com Sasuke... Uma história aparentemente simples, em que o herói acumula poderes e vence os malvados, fazendo amigos no caminho, certo? Errado. Naruto tem ação e comédia, sim, mas o tema central do mangá é a solidão e como cada um dos personagens lida com essa solidão. A leveza cômica de alguns capítulos é francamente contrastante com o clima pesado e trágico de outros.
